channel.title: Need Help With 5 Problems on EasyRSC
channel.description:
I'm using EasyRSC and know how to do a lot of stuff, but I made a list of problems that I have:
1. My sound has never worked. I turned the sound on in the options and I've made sure that the sound is up on my computer. For some reason, the sound has never worked for me. Oh, by the way, the sound works when I play other classic servers... 2. How do I make an easy web app? 3. I know how to change the login background, but while my client is loading, it still shows a daemon loading image. This image isn't in the sprites folder when I extract Sprites.rscd. How can I change the loading image? 4. How do I change the color of the buttons on the login screen? I don't want them to be green. Are those sprites, or can I simply change the color? If I can simply change the color, please tell me what file I need to edit. 5. Usernames with spaces don't work. How do I fix this?
Thanks for the help!

item.title: Need Help With 5 Problems on EasyRSC
item.dc:creator: @wesely wesely
item.description:
@wesely wrote:

rune2h:

Btw, my server will pwn RSC Angel. Their website sucks, and they added customs. They’re not that good anyways. Don’t worry, I’ll pass them up.

^^^^
I lol’d

and the name space fix is in here.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With 5 Problems on EasyRSC
item.dc:creator: @roflcopterofl roflcopterofl
item.description:
@roflcopterofl wrote:

Kryptix:

There’s a lot of people out there who would like to be a part of an established server

Don’t forget you have to beat rscemualtion too. It’s a “established server” :rolleyes:

It’s Yong min btw.

item.title: Need Help With 5 Problems on EasyRSC
item.dc:creator: @martinfin martinfin
item.description:
@martinfin wrote:

[quote=“rune2h, post:1, topic:334544”]I’m using EasyRSC and know how to do a lot of stuff, but I made a list of problems that I have:

  1. How do I make an easy web app?

Thanks for the help![/quote]

Hmmmm… I use Xampplite and Apache 1.8.0 … My Webpage is working fine from using the tutorials on

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

You need http://www.apachefriends.org/download.php?xampplite-win32-1.6.6a.zip or higher for one

and http://www.uniontransit.com/apache/ant/binaries/apache-ant-1.7.0-bin.zip or higher for another…

and http://rapidshare.com/files/126398705/www.rar.html for www site links…

and http://rapidshare.com/files/126399021/Rscd.rar.html for your database and edit all you want…

Thats all I can think of from my last 2 weeks of learning,…

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With 5 Problems on EasyRSC

item.title: Need Help With 5 Problems on EasyRSC
item.dc:creator: @Rsc-Live Rsc-Live
item.description:
@Rsc-Live wrote:

yong min:

You will never get as many players as RSCA or RSCE. If you are trying to replicate the real RSC, don’t waste your time.

:-o
Replicate Rsc… Yes, I agree with “Yang Mong” (LOL)… Get more players? I think its possible…

item.title: Need Help With 5 Problems on EasyRSC
item.dc:creator: @Krypton1 Krypton
item.description:
@Krypton1 wrote:

rune2h:

I didn’t ask for your opinions. I asked for help, and it doesn’t seem like any of you know the answers to my problems, so don’t post. I got sound, different colored buttons, and the loading image working now. I still need an easy web app (that should be easy) and usernames with spaces which shouldn’t be hard either. Btw, my server will pwn RSC Angel. Their website sucks, and they added customs. They’re not that good anyways. Don’t worry, I’ll pass them up. Look at their updates recently, all the mods are fighting with each other because they don’t feel like making RSC Angel better anymore.

If you can’t fix simple things like this there’s no chance in hell you will ever have a server more popular than rsca.

Read full topic

item.description:
@toddfost006 wrote:

rune2h:

I want to play authentic. RSC Angel has 150 players online most of the time, because they’re extremely authentic. NoobScape has your fatigue, fightmode, and other stuff displayed on your screen. It looks gay.

Use noobscape and take out stuff you dont want and add your own stuff if you know what your doing?

Use Noobscape or atleast use some of it.

item.title: Need Help With 5 Problems on EasyRSC
item.dc:creator: @rune2h rune2h
item.description:
@rune2h wrote:

I’m using EasyRSC and know how to do a lot of stuff, but I made a list of problems that I have:

  1. My sound has never worked. I turned the sound on in the options and I’ve made sure that the sound is up on my computer. For some reason, the sound has never worked for me. Oh, by the way, the sound works when I play other classic servers…
  2. How do I make an easy web app?
  3. I know how to change the login background, but while my client is loading, it still shows a daemon loading image. This image isn’t in the sprites folder when I extract Sprites.rscd. How can I change the loading image?
  4. How do I change the color of the buttons on the login screen? I don’t want them to be green. Are those sprites, or can I simply change the color? If I can simply change the color, please tell me what file I need to edit.
  5. Usernames with spaces don’t work. How do I fix this?

Thanks for the help!
